item.name: Alcatraz: The Scapegoat
item.comment: Very good game. Workmanship on highest level, but instruction is a nightmare... Totally useless. You must guessing some rules. Another weak point: mechanism of choosing a scapegoat. If this two things were better I would rate this game on 7.5.

item.name: Chaos Marauders (second edition)
item.comment: Easy, quick, fun. I especially like illustrations on cards and spite cube with mark of chaos ;)

item.name: Defenders of the Realm
item.comment: I like this game and I want gave it 8 but workmanship of the game is too weak (graph, cards, miniatures, board - it might been better).

item.name: Dungeons & Dragons Miniatures
item.comment: I used them only for RPG sessions.

item.name: Dziedzictwo: Testament Diuka de Crecy
item.originalname: Legacy: The Testament of Duke de Crecy

item.name: Eaten by Zombies!
item.comment: Average. I always play it on two players. Maybe on 3 or 4 it's more absorb. I like theme, illustrations and box but I was bored when I was playing it.

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game
Gra o Tron: Gra Planszowa (druga edycja)
item.originalname: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)

item.name: Horror w Arkham
item.originalname: Arkham Horror
item.comment: Excellent game! I am waiting for polish expansions. Probably then Arkham Horror will be 10 for me ;)

item.name: Invasion from Outer Space: The Martian Game
Inwigilacja Luksusowa
item.comment: Something like Clue with few new rules in political theme. You must reveal political scandals (asked the questions: when, where, what) of your opponents.

item.name: List Miłosny
item.originalname: Love Letter
item.comment: Small and very fast but it is very good game too. It's simple so you can play it with everyone. It could be party game and it could be nice game after something difficult and long when your friends don't want back to their homes.

item.name: Lords of Xidit
item.comment: Nice but nothing special. The game looks good and has a very good mechanic but I've seen many similar and better games with better theme. I'll sell my copy by few plays if I get one.

item.name: Magia i Miecz
item.originalname: Talisman

item.name: Magia i Miecz: Miasto
item.originalname: Talisman City

item.name: Magia i Miecz: Podziemia
item.originalname: The Talisman Dungeon

item.name: Magia i Miecz: W kosmicznej otchłani
item.originalname: Talisman Timescape

item.name: Mansions of Madness
item.comment: After first play I gave 5 but now I think that this game don't deserve on that note. However the most part of my rating is still game looks. Probably this isn't my kind of games... I expected something different.

item.name: Onirim
item.comment: Quick but good. IMO Onirim for two playeres is better than solo play because game is more difficult then.

item.name: Osadnicy z Catanu
item.originalname: Catan

item.name: Pandemic
item.comment: Deep disappointment. It's too easy to win... and boring.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventure on the Cursed Island
item.originalname: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventure on the Cursed Island – Trait Cards I
Rune Age
item.comment: After played Elder Sign (IMO that is average and even cthulhu mythos theme didn't change it) I didn't expect that medium card game like RA can be as goog as it is. You can play it with non-gamer friends and they will be enjoyed it. Also you can play it with gamers and the won't be disappointed. It's good when you don't have much time for something bigger or when you don't have mood for something difficult.

item.name: UNO
item.comment: Something like card game Macao with special deck.

item.name: Wojna o Pierścień

item.name: World of Warcraft: The Boardgame
item.comment: Very long and boring. This game have only one bright side and this is mechanism of promote your hero to the next level where you can choose skills and upgrade your character.

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra Karciana
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
item.comment: Probably the best card game on the world. Shadows over Mirkwood: :star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::nostar::nostar: Journey down the Anduine: :star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::halfstar::nostar: Escape from Dol Guldur: :star::star::star::star::star::star::star::halfstar::nostar::nostar:

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra Karciana – Kamienne Podstawy Ziemi
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Foundations of Stone

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Brama Czerwonego Rogu
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Redhorn Gate
item.comment: As far one of the best AP that I've played. The scenario is really brilliant and I'm going to return to this adventure with plaesure. Scenario: :star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star:

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Cień i Płomień
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Shadow and Flame

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra Karciana – Czarni Jeźdźcy
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Black Riders

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Czatownik
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Watcher in the Water
item.comment: In this AP you have the best cards from whole cycle and very nice adventure with story theme. When I played it first time I thinked that is a easy scenario but when I had tried this one on elven deck the scenario was the hard one. Player cards: :star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star: Scnenario: :star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::nostar:

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Droga do Rivendell
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Road to Rivendell
item.comment: This AP give you very nice player cards and hack&slash adventure. The scenario could be better and if I must rate only scenario I gave it :star::star::star::star::star::star::halfstar::nostar::nostar::nostar:

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra Karciana – Hobbit: Górą i dołem (alternate)
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra Karciana – Hobbit: Na Progu
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Khazad-dûm
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Khazad-dûm
item.comment: At the first time I hadn't liked the scenarios from this expansion but after couple games I changed my opinion. The first scenario is fery difficult but is my favourite from this box. The second one is very random. You can win fast or you can play and play and you finally don't win after 50 minutes. Into the pit: :star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::star::nostar: Seventh level: :star::star::star::star::star::halfstar::nostar::nostar::nostar::nostar::nostar: Flight from Moria: :star::star::star::star::star::star::star::nostar::nostar::nostar:

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Martwe Bagna
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Dead Marshes
item.comment: I always play that when 8 tokens is on Gollum's card the game ends - Gollum escaped and players lost. Brilliant! One of my favourite scenarios.

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Mroki Morii
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Long Dark

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Podróż do Rhosgobel
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – A Journey to Rhosgobel
item.comment: Another quick scenario... Strong players cards! I have mixed feelings about this AP. I'm not particularly keen on this scenario. If I must rate only scenario I'm rating it for 4.

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Polowanie na Golluma
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hunt for Gollum
item.comment: Very long adventure. Can be boring... I don't like this scenario but I rated AP on 8 because this have nice player cards and this was a first expansion (long waiting for premiere - this is the main reason). Scenario: :star::star::star::star::star::halfstar::nostar::nostar::nostar::nostar:

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Powrót do Mrocznej Puszczy
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Return to Mirkwood
item.comment: My fav of Shadows of Mirkwood cycle :) Great, fun and exhaustive scenario. Players cards are not bad too. Dain is very strong character but I'm still regreting that in this AP isn't elves hero.

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra Karciana – Spadkobiercy Númenoru
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Heirs of Númenor

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Starcie u stóp Samotnej Skały
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Conflict at the Carrock
item.comment: Very quickly adventure but very hard too. I like the trolls :)

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra karciana – Wzgórza Emyn Muil
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hills of Emyn Muil
item.comment: Nice. I like it. Great for solo play, but in other ways scenario is very very hard on 3-4 players.

item.name: Złote Miasto
item.originalname: The Golden City
